FFXIVTexTools2.log:
Version 1.9.9.3 - Includes 1.9.9.2 update by Sel
Application: - Support for patch 4.55
Bug Fixes: - Fix for UI handling after patch 4.55 - Fix for Mod Pack import not showing size values larger than 2 GB.
Known Issues: - Skeleton files may need updating for some newer items. (Ex. Some Hairstyles and Bonewicca pieces)
For previous changelogs check the Change Log section of the website.
